app.title: InfoJet - Mailjet Statistics Analyzer
app.description: Easily analyze your Mailjet statistics with InfoJet. Visualize open rates, clicks, and email campaign performance in seconds.

dataProcessing.title: Data Processing
dataProcessing.intro: InfoJet is an analysis tool that processes your Mailjet data temporarily and locally:

points.noStorage: No data is stored on our servers
points.browserOnly: Processing is done entirely in your browser
points.autoDelete: Data is automatically deleted when you close your browser
points.noAccess: We have no access to any information from your Mailjet account

cookies.title: Cookies and Trackers
cookies.intro: InfoJet does not collect any personal data and does not use any tracking cookies:

security.title: Security
security.intro: Your data security is our priority:

points.noTransmission: No data transmission to external servers
points.csvSecurity: CSV files never leave your browser

contact.title: Contact
contact.text: For any questions about our privacy policy, you can contact us at: privacy@infojet.app
